name: fake-response-server
description: Simple extension helps to generate local mock server

fake-response-server.settings.port.description: Set custom port to generate local mock server

fake-response-server.settings.baseUrl.description: Set custom base url. This url will be added as a prefix to every routes

rootPath.description: Set custom root path. Note : every other paths given in will be relative to this root path

mockPath.description: Set mock Path to generate local mock server. Note : If the path points to a folder, the mock will be generated for every json files inside the given folder

envPath.description: Set custom environment data folder Path. Note : The .json files inside the folder will be listed down for switching environment using `Switch environment` command

injectorsPath.description: Provide the injectors.js path. Note: the js file must have an default module export of the injectors list.

generateMockCallbackPath.description: Provide the callback.js path. Note: the js file must have an default module export of callback method. This method will be called for each entry in HAR object.

fake-response-server.settings.resourceTy.description: Provide list of resourceTypes to generate a mock

fake-response-server.settings.filterSche.description: Provide schema to filter object properties

fake-response-server.settings.globals.description: Provide any initial values before starting the server

fake-response-server.settings.groupings.description: Provide URL mapping for Grouping Routes

fake-response-server.settings.proxy.exac.description: Set custom proxy that matches the route

fake-response-server.settings.proxy.patt.description: Set custom proxy that matches the pattern

fake-response-server.settings.excludeRou.description: If true, This will add all grouping routes to the exclude routes list.
If true, This will add all proxy pattern match routes to the exclude routes list.
If true, This will add all proxy exact match routes to the exclude routes list.
Provide list of routes to exclude form generate local server that matches this pattern
Provide list of routes to exclude form generate local server that matches this route

fake-response-server.settings.commonDela.description: Provide a common delay in milliseconds

fake-response-server.settings.overrideCo.description: If true, it overrides all specific delays provided in the injectors.

fake-response-server.settings.showOnStat.description: Change this to false if you don't want the button to show in statusbar

fake-response-server.settings.donotShowI.description: Change this to true if you don't want to show information pop up messages.

fake-response-server.settings.sortArray..description: Change this to false if you want to sort array in descending order

fake-response-server.settings.sortObject.description: Change this to false if you want to sort object in descending order
Change this to true if you dont want to sort object in ascending or descending order

fake-response-server.settings.sort.caseI.description: Change this to false if you want to sort Json in case sensitive order.

fake-response-server.settings.sortObject.description: Object keys will be sorted in the given order

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
